00049 typedef enum {
00050         SRPC_STATE_NONE,
00051         SRPC_STATE_NI_INIT,
00052         SRPC_STATE_EQ_INIT,
00053         SRPC_STATE_RUNNING,
00054         SRPC_STATE_STOPPING,
00055 } srpc_state_t;
00056 
00057 static struct smoketest_rpc {
00058         spinlock_t       rpc_glock;     /* global lock */
00059         srpc_service_t  *rpc_services[SRPC_SERVICE_MAX_ID + 1];
00060         lnet_handle_eq_t rpc_lnet_eq;   /* _the_ LNet event queue */
00061         srpc_state_t     rpc_state;
00062         srpc_counters_t  rpc_counters;
00063         __u64            rpc_matchbits; /* matchbits counter */
00064 } srpc_data;
00065 
00066 static inline int
00067 srpc_serv_portal(int svc_id)
00068 {
00069         return svc_id < SRPC_FRAMEWORK_SERVICE_MAX_ID ?
00070                SRPC_FRAMEWORK_REQUEST_PORTAL : SRPC_REQUEST_PORTAL;
00071 }

00073 /* forward ref's */
00074 int srpc_handle_rpc (swi_workitem_t *wi);
00075 
00076 void srpc_get_counters (srpc_counters_t *cnt)
00077 {
00078         spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00079         *cnt = srpc_data.rpc_counters;
00080         spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00081 }
00082 
00083 void srpc_set_counters (const srpc_counters_t *cnt)
00084 {
00085         spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00086         srpc_data.rpc_counters = *cnt;
00087         spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00088 }

00090 static int
00091 srpc_add_bulk_page(srpc_bulk_t *bk, struct page *pg, int i, int nob)
00092 {
00093         nob = min(nob, (int)PAGE_CACHE_SIZE);
00094 
00095         LASSERT(nob > 0);
00096         LASSERT(i >= 0 && i < bk->bk_niov);
00097 
00098         bk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_offset = 0;
00099         bk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_page   = pg;
00100         bk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_len    = nob;
00101         return nob;
00102 }
00103 
00104 void
00105 srpc_free_bulk (srpc_bulk_t *bk)
00106 {
00107         int         i;
00108         struct page *pg;
00109 
00110         LASSERT (bk != NULL);
00111 
00112         for (i = 0; i < bk->bk_niov; i++) {
00113                 pg = bk->bk_iovs[i].kiov_page;
00114                 if (pg == NULL) break;
00115 
00116                 __free_page(pg);
00117         }
00118 
00119         LIBCFS_FREE(bk, offsetof(srpc_bulk_t, bk_iovs[bk->bk_niov]));
00120         return;
00121 }
00122 
00123 srpc_bulk_t *
00124 srpc_alloc_bulk(int cpt, unsigned bulk_npg, unsigned bulk_len, int sink)
00125 {
00126         srpc_bulk_t  *bk;
00127         int           i;
00128 
00129         LASSERT(bulk_npg > 0 && bulk_npg <= LNET_MAX_IOV);
00130 
00131         LIBCFS_CPT_ALLOC(bk, lnet_cpt_table(), cpt,
00132                          offsetof(srpc_bulk_t, bk_iovs[bulk_npg]));
00133         if (bk == NULL) {
00134                 CERROR("Can't allocate descriptor for %d pages\n", bulk_npg);
00135                 return NULL;
00136         }
00137 
00138         memset(bk, 0, offsetof(srpc_bulk_t, bk_iovs[bulk_npg]));
00139         bk->bk_sink   = sink;
00140         bk->bk_len    = bulk_len;
00141         bk->bk_niov   = bulk_npg;
00142 
00143         for (i = 0; i < bulk_npg; i++) {
00144                 struct page *pg;
00145                 int         nob;
00146 
00147                 pg = cfs_page_cpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(), cpt, GFP_KERNEL);
00148                 if (pg == NULL) {
00149                         CERROR("Can't allocate page %d of %d\n", i, bulk_npg);
00150                         srpc_free_bulk(bk);
00151                         return NULL;
00152                 }
00153 
00154                 nob = srpc_add_bulk_page(bk, pg, i, bulk_len);
00155                 bulk_len -= nob;
00156         }
00157 
00158         return bk;
00159 }
00160 
00161 static inline __u64
00162 srpc_next_id (void)
00163 {
00164         __u64 id;
00165 
00166         spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00167         id = srpc_data.rpc_matchbits++;
00168         spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00169         return id;
00170 }
00171 
00172 static void
00173 srpc_init_server_rpc(struct srpc_server_rpc *rpc,
00174                      struct srpc_service_cd *scd,
00175                      struct srpc_buffer *buffer)
00176 {
00177         memset(rpc, 0, sizeof(*rpc));
00178         swi_init_workitem(&rpc->srpc_wi, rpc, srpc_handle_rpc,
00179                           srpc_serv_is_framework(scd->scd_svc) ?
00180                           lst_sched_serial : lst_sched_test[scd->scd_cpt]);
00181 
00182         rpc->srpc_ev.ev_fired = 1; /* no event expected now */
00183 
00184         rpc->srpc_scd      = scd;
00185         rpc->srpc_reqstbuf = buffer;
00186         rpc->srpc_peer     = buffer->buf_peer;
00187         rpc->srpc_self     = buffer->buf_self;
00188         LNetInvalidateHandle(&rpc->srpc_replymdh);
00189 }
00190 
00191 static void
00192 srpc_service_fini(struct srpc_service *svc)
00193 {
00194         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd;
00195         struct srpc_server_rpc  *rpc;
00196         struct srpc_buffer      *buf;
00197         struct list_head                *q;
00198         int                     i;
00199 
00200         if (svc->sv_cpt_data == NULL)
00201                 return;
00202 
00203         cfs_percpt_for_each(scd, i, svc->sv_cpt_data) {
00204                 while (1) {
00205                         if (!list_empty(&scd->scd_buf_posted))
00206                                 q = &scd->scd_buf_posted;
00207                         else if (!list_empty(&scd->scd_buf_blocked))
00208                                 q = &scd->scd_buf_blocked;
00209                         else
00210                                 break;
00211 
00212                         while (!list_empty(q)) {
00213                                 buf = list_entry(q->next,
00214                                                      struct srpc_buffer,
00215                                                      buf_list);
00216                                 list_del(&buf->buf_list);
00217                                 LIBCFS_FREE(buf, sizeof(*buf));
00218                         }
00219                 }
00220 
00221                 LASSERT(list_empty(&scd->scd_rpc_active));
00222 
00223                 while (!list_empty(&scd->scd_rpc_free)) {
00224                         rpc = list_entry(scd->scd_rpc_free.next,
00225                                              struct srpc_server_rpc,
00226                                              srpc_list);
00227                         list_del(&rpc->srpc_list);
00228                         LIBCFS_FREE(rpc, sizeof(*rpc));
00229                 }
00230         }
00231 
00232         cfs_percpt_free(svc->sv_cpt_data);
00233         svc->sv_cpt_data = NULL;
00234 }
00235 
00236 static int
00237 srpc_service_nrpcs(struct srpc_service *svc)
00238 {
00239         int nrpcs = svc->sv_wi_total / svc->sv_ncpts;
00240 
00241         return srpc_serv_is_framework(svc) ?
00242                max(nrpcs, SFW_FRWK_WI_MIN) : max(nrpcs, SFW_TEST_WI_MIN);
00243 }
00244 
00245 int srpc_add_buffer(struct swi_workitem *wi);
00246 
00247 static int
00248 srpc_service_init(struct srpc_service *svc)
00249 {
00250         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd;
00251         struct srpc_server_rpc  *rpc;
00252         int                     nrpcs;
00253         int                     i;
00254         int                     j;
00255 
00256         svc->sv_shuttingdown = 0;
00257 
00258         svc->sv_cpt_data = cfs_percpt_alloc(lnet_cpt_table(),
00259                                             sizeof(struct srpc_service_cd));
00260         if (svc->sv_cpt_data == NULL)
00261                 return -ENOMEM;
00262 
00263         svc->sv_ncpts = srpc_serv_is_framework(svc) ?
00264                         1 : cfs_cpt_number(lnet_cpt_table());
00265         nrpcs = srpc_service_nrpcs(svc);
00266 
00267         cfs_percpt_for_each(scd, i, svc->sv_cpt_data) {
00268                 scd->scd_cpt = i;
00269                 scd->scd_svc = svc;
00270                 spin_lock_init(&scd->scd_lock);
00271                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&scd->scd_rpc_free);
00272                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&scd->scd_rpc_active);
00273                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&scd->scd_buf_posted);
00274                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&scd->scd_buf_blocked);
00275 
00276                 scd->scd_ev.ev_data = scd;
00277                 scd->scd_ev.ev_type = SRPC_REQUEST_RCVD;
00278 
00279                 /* NB: don't use lst_sched_serial for adding buffer,
00280                  * see details in srpc_service_add_buffers() */
00281                 swi_init_workitem(&scd->scd_buf_wi, scd,
00282                                   srpc_add_buffer, lst_sched_test[i]);
00283 
00284                 if (i != 0 && srpc_serv_is_framework(svc)) {
00285                         /* NB: framework service only needs srpc_service_cd for
00286                          * one partition, but we allocate for all to make
00287                          * it easier to implement, it will waste a little
00288                          * memory but nobody should care about this */
00289                         continue;
00290                 }
00291 
00292                 for (j = 0; j < nrpcs; j++) {
00293                         LIBCFS_CPT_ALLOC(rpc, lnet_cpt_table(),
00294                                          i, sizeof(*rpc));
00295                         if (rpc == NULL) {
00296                                 srpc_service_fini(svc);
00297                                 return -ENOMEM;
00298                         }
00299                         list_add(&rpc->srpc_list, &scd->scd_rpc_free);
00300                 }
00301         }
00302 
00303         return 0;
00304 }
00305 
00306 int
00307 srpc_add_service(struct srpc_service *sv)
00308 {
00309         int id = sv->sv_id;
00310 
00311         LASSERT(0 <= id && id <= SRPC_SERVICE_MAX_ID);
00312 
00313         if (srpc_service_init(sv) != 0)
00314                 return -ENOMEM;
00315 
00316         spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00317 
00318         LASSERT(srpc_data.rpc_state == SRPC_STATE_RUNNING);
00319 
00320         if (srpc_data.rpc_services[id] != NULL) {
00321                 spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00322                 goto failed;
00323         }
00324 
00325         srpc_data.rpc_services[id] = sv;
00326         spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00327 
00328         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Adding service: id %d, name %s\n", id, sv->sv_name);
00329         return 0;
00330 
00331  failed:
00332         srpc_service_fini(sv);
00333         return -EBUSY;
00334 }
00335 
00336 int
00337 srpc_remove_service (srpc_service_t *sv)
00338 {
00339         int id = sv->sv_id;
00340 
00341         spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00342 
00343         if (srpc_data.rpc_services[id] != sv) {
00344                 spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00345                 return -ENOENT;
00346         }
00347 
00348         srpc_data.rpc_services[id] = NULL;
00349         spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00350         return 0;
00351 }
00352 
00353 static int
00354 srpc_post_passive_rdma(int portal, int local, __u64 matchbits, void *buf,
00355                        int len, int options, lnet_process_id_t peer,
00356                        lnet_handle_md_t *mdh, srpc_event_t *ev)
00357 {
00358         int              rc;
00359         lnet_md_t        md;
00360         lnet_handle_me_t meh;
00361 
00362         rc = LNetMEAttach(portal, peer, matchbits, 0, LNET_UNLINK,
00363                           local ? LNET_INS_LOCAL : LNET_INS_AFTER, &meh);
00364         if (rc != 0) {
00365                 CERROR ("LNetMEAttach failed: %d\n", rc);
00366                 LASSERT (rc == -ENOMEM);
00367                 return -ENOMEM;
00368         }
00369 
00370         md.threshold = 1;
00371         md.user_ptr  = ev;
00372         md.start     = buf;
00373         md.length    = len;
00374         md.options   = options;
00375         md.eq_handle = srpc_data.rpc_lnet_eq;
00376 
00377         rc = LNetMDAttach(meh, md, LNET_UNLINK, mdh);
00378         if (rc != 0) {
00379                 CERROR ("LNetMDAttach failed: %d\n", rc);
00380                 LASSERT (rc == -ENOMEM);
00381 
00382                 rc = LNetMEUnlink(meh);
00383                 LASSERT (rc == 0);
00384                 return -ENOMEM;
00385         }
00386 
00387         CDEBUG (D_NET,
00388                 "Posted passive RDMA: peer %s, portal %d, matchbits "LPX64"\n",
00389                 libcfs_id2str(peer), portal, matchbits);
00390         return 0;
00391 }
00392 
00393 static int
00394 srpc_post_active_rdma(int portal, __u64 matchbits, void *buf, int len,
00395                       int options, lnet_process_id_t peer, lnet_nid_t self,
00396                       lnet_handle_md_t *mdh, srpc_event_t *ev)
00397 {
00398         int       rc;
00399         lnet_md_t md;
00400 
00401         md.user_ptr  = ev;
00402         md.start     = buf;
00403         md.length    = len;
00404         md.eq_handle = srpc_data.rpc_lnet_eq;
00405         md.threshold = ((options & LNET_MD_OP_GET) != 0) ? 2 : 1;
00406         md.options   = options & ~(LNET_MD_OP_PUT | LNET_MD_OP_GET);
00407 
00408         rc = LNetMDBind(md, LNET_UNLINK, mdh);
00409         if (rc != 0) {
00410                 CERROR ("LNetMDBind failed: %d\n", rc);
00411                 LASSERT (rc == -ENOMEM);
00412                 return -ENOMEM;
00413         }
00414 
00415         /* this is kind of an abuse of the LNET_MD_OP_{PUT,GET} options.
00416          * they're only meaningful for MDs attached to an ME (i.e. passive
00417          * buffers... */
00418         if ((options & LNET_MD_OP_PUT) != 0) {
00419                 rc = LNetPut(self, *mdh, LNET_NOACK_REQ, peer,
00420                              portal, matchbits, 0, 0);
00421         } else {
00422                 LASSERT ((options & LNET_MD_OP_GET) != 0);
00423 
00424                 rc = LNetGet(self, *mdh, peer, portal, matchbits, 0);
00425         }
00426 
00427         if (rc != 0) {
00428                 CERROR ("LNet%s(%s, %d, "LPD64") failed: %d\n",
00429                         ((options & LNET_MD_OP_PUT) != 0) ? "Put" : "Get",
00430                         libcfs_id2str(peer), portal, matchbits, rc);
00431 
00432                 /* The forthcoming unlink event will complete this operation
00433                  * with failure, so fall through and return success here.
00434                  */
00435                 rc = LNetMDUnlink(*mdh);
00436                 LASSERT (rc == 0);
00437         } else {
00438                 CDEBUG (D_NET,
00439                         "Posted active RDMA: peer %s, portal %u, matchbits "LPX64"\n",
00440                         libcfs_id2str(peer), portal, matchbits);
00441         }
00442         return 0;
00443 }
00444 
00445 static int
00446 srpc_post_passive_rqtbuf(int service, int local, void *buf, int len,
00447                          lnet_handle_md_t *mdh, srpc_event_t *ev)
00448 {
00449         lnet_process_id_t any = {0};
00450 
00451         any.nid = LNET_NID_ANY;
00452         any.pid = LNET_PID_ANY;
00453 
00454         return srpc_post_passive_rdma(srpc_serv_portal(service),
00455                                       local, service, buf, len,
00456                                       LNET_MD_OP_PUT, any, mdh, ev);
00457 }
00458 
00459 static int
00460 srpc_service_post_buffer(struct srpc_service_cd *scd, struct srpc_buffer *buf)
00461 __must_hold(&scd->scd_lock)
00462 {
00463         struct srpc_service     *sv = scd->scd_svc;
00464         struct srpc_msg         *msg = &buf->buf_msg;
00465         int                     rc;
00466 
00467         LNetInvalidateHandle(&buf->buf_mdh);
00468         list_add(&buf->buf_list, &scd->scd_buf_posted);
00469         scd->scd_buf_nposted++;
00470         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00471 
00472         rc = srpc_post_passive_rqtbuf(sv->sv_id,
00473                                       !srpc_serv_is_framework(sv),
00474                                       msg, sizeof(*msg), &buf->buf_mdh,
00475                                       &scd->scd_ev);
00476 
00477         /* At this point, a RPC (new or delayed) may have arrived in
00478          * msg and its event handler has been called. So we must add
00479          * buf to scd_buf_posted _before_ dropping scd_lock */
00480 
00481         spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00482 
00483         if (rc == 0) {
00484                 if (!sv->sv_shuttingdown)
00485                         return 0;
00486 
00487                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00488                 /* srpc_shutdown_service might have tried to unlink me
00489                  * when my buf_mdh was still invalid */
00490                 LNetMDUnlink(buf->buf_mdh);
00491                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00492                 return 0;
00493         }
00494 
00495         scd->scd_buf_nposted--;
00496         if (sv->sv_shuttingdown)
00497                 return rc; /* don't allow to change scd_buf_posted */
00498 
00499         list_del(&buf->buf_list);
00500         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00501 
00502         LIBCFS_FREE(buf, sizeof(*buf));
00503 
00504         spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00505         return rc;
00506 }
00507 
00508 int
00509 srpc_add_buffer(struct swi_workitem *wi)
00510 {
00511         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd = wi->swi_workitem.wi_data;
00512         struct srpc_buffer      *buf;
00513         int                     rc = 0;
00514 
00515         /* it's called by workitem scheduler threads, these threads
00516          * should have been set CPT affinity, so buffers will be posted
00517          * on CPT local list of Portal */
00518         spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00519 
00520         while (scd->scd_buf_adjust > 0 &&
00521                !scd->scd_svc->sv_shuttingdown) {
00522                 scd->scd_buf_adjust--; /* consume it */
00523                 scd->scd_buf_posting++;
00524 
00525                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00526 
00527                 LIBCFS_ALLOC(buf, sizeof(*buf));
00528                 if (buf == NULL) {
00529                         CERROR("Failed to add new buf to service: %s\n",
00530                                scd->scd_svc->sv_name);
00531                         spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00532                         rc = -ENOMEM;
00533                         break;
00534                 }
00535 
00536                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00537                 if (scd->scd_svc->sv_shuttingdown) {
00538                         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00539                         LIBCFS_FREE(buf, sizeof(*buf));
00540 
00541                         spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00542                         rc = -ESHUTDOWN;
00543                         break;
00544                 }
00545 
00546                 rc = srpc_service_post_buffer(scd, buf);
00547                 if (rc != 0)
00548                         break; /* buf has been freed inside */
00549 
00550                 LASSERT(scd->scd_buf_posting > 0);
00551                 scd->scd_buf_posting--;
00552                 scd->scd_buf_total++;
00553                 scd->scd_buf_low = MAX(2, scd->scd_buf_total / 4);
00554         }
00555 
00556         if (rc != 0) {
00557                 scd->scd_buf_err_stamp = cfs_time_current_sec();
00558                 scd->scd_buf_err = rc;
00559 
00560                 LASSERT(scd->scd_buf_posting > 0);
00561                 scd->scd_buf_posting--;
00562         }
00563 
00564         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00565         return 0;
00566 }
00567 
00568 int
00569 srpc_service_add_buffers(struct srpc_service *sv, int nbuffer)
00570 {
00571         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd;
00572         int                     rc = 0;
00573         int                     i;
00574 
00575         LASSERTF(nbuffer > 0, "nbuffer must be positive: %d\n", nbuffer);
00576 
00577         cfs_percpt_for_each(scd, i, sv->sv_cpt_data) {
00578                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00579 
00580                 scd->scd_buf_err = 0;
00581                 scd->scd_buf_err_stamp = 0;
00582                 scd->scd_buf_posting = 0;
00583                 scd->scd_buf_adjust = nbuffer;
00584                 /* start to post buffers */
00585                 swi_schedule_workitem(&scd->scd_buf_wi);
00586                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00587 
00588                 /* framework service only post buffer for one partition  */
00589                 if (srpc_serv_is_framework(sv))
00590                         break;
00591         }
00592 
00593         cfs_percpt_for_each(scd, i, sv->sv_cpt_data) {
00594                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00595                 /*
00596                  * NB: srpc_service_add_buffers() can be called inside
00597                  * thread context of lst_sched_serial, and we don't normally
00598                  * allow to sleep inside thread context of WI scheduler
00599                  * because it will block current scheduler thread from doing
00600                  * anything else, even worse, it could deadlock if it's
00601                  * waiting on result from another WI of the same scheduler.
00602                  * However, it's safe at here because scd_buf_wi is scheduled
00603                  * by thread in a different WI scheduler (lst_sched_test),
00604                  * so we don't have any risk of deadlock, though this could
00605                  * block all WIs pending on lst_sched_serial for a moment
00606                  * which is not good but not fatal.
00607                  */
00608                 lst_wait_until(scd->scd_buf_err != 0 ||
00609                                (scd->scd_buf_adjust == 0 &&
00610                                 scd->scd_buf_posting == 0),
00611                                scd->scd_lock, "waiting for adding buffer\n");
00612 
00613                 if (scd->scd_buf_err != 0 && rc == 0)
00614                         rc = scd->scd_buf_err;
00615 
00616                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00617         }
00618 
00619         return rc;
00620 }
00621 
00622 void
00623 srpc_service_remove_buffers(struct srpc_service *sv, int nbuffer)
00624 {
00625         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd;
00626         int                     num;
00627         int                     i;
00628 
00629         LASSERT(!sv->sv_shuttingdown);
00630 
00631         cfs_percpt_for_each(scd, i, sv->sv_cpt_data) {
00632                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00633 
00634                 num = scd->scd_buf_total + scd->scd_buf_posting;
00635                 scd->scd_buf_adjust -= min(nbuffer, num);
00636 
00637                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00638         }
00639 }
00640 
00641 /* returns 1 if sv has finished, otherwise 0 */
00642 int
00643 srpc_finish_service(struct srpc_service *sv)
00644 {
00645         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd;
00646         struct srpc_server_rpc  *rpc;
00647         int                     i;
00648 
00649         LASSERT(sv->sv_shuttingdown); /* srpc_shutdown_service called */
00650 
00651         cfs_percpt_for_each(scd, i, sv->sv_cpt_data) {
00652                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00653                 if (!swi_deschedule_workitem(&scd->scd_buf_wi)) {
00654                         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00655                         return 0;
00656                 }
00657 
00658                 if (scd->scd_buf_nposted > 0) {
00659                         CDEBUG(D_NET, "waiting for %d posted buffers to "
00660                                "unlink\n", scd->scd_buf_nposted);
00661                         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00662                         return 0;
00663                 }
00664 
00665                 if (list_empty(&scd->scd_rpc_active)) {
00666                         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00667                         continue;
00668                 }
00669 
00670                 rpc = list_entry(scd->scd_rpc_active.next,
00671                                      struct srpc_server_rpc, srpc_list);
00672                 CNETERR("Active RPC %p on shutdown: sv %s, peer %s, "
00673                         "wi %s scheduled %d running %d, "
00674                         "ev fired %d type %d status %d lnet %d\n",
00675                         rpc, sv->sv_name, libcfs_id2str(rpc->srpc_peer),
00676                         swi_state2str(rpc->srpc_wi.swi_state),
00677                         rpc->srpc_wi.swi_workitem.wi_scheduled,
00678                         rpc->srpc_wi.swi_workitem.wi_running,
00679                         rpc->srpc_ev.ev_fired, rpc->srpc_ev.ev_type,
00680                         rpc->srpc_ev.ev_status, rpc->srpc_ev.ev_lnet);
00681                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00682                 return 0;
00683         }
00684 
00685         /* no lock needed from now on */
00686         srpc_service_fini(sv);
00687         return 1;
00688 }
00689 
00690 /* called with sv->sv_lock held */
00691 static void
00692 srpc_service_recycle_buffer(struct srpc_service_cd *scd, srpc_buffer_t *buf)
00693 __must_hold(&scd->scd_lock)
00694 {
00695         if (!scd->scd_svc->sv_shuttingdown && scd->scd_buf_adjust >= 0) {
00696                 if (srpc_service_post_buffer(scd, buf) != 0) {
00697                         CWARN("Failed to post %s buffer\n",
00698                               scd->scd_svc->sv_name);
00699                 }
00700                 return;
00701         }
00702 
00703         /* service is shutting down, or we want to recycle some buffers */
00704         scd->scd_buf_total--;
00705 
00706         if (scd->scd_buf_adjust < 0) {
00707                 scd->scd_buf_adjust++;
00708                 if (scd->scd_buf_adjust < 0 &&
00709                     scd->scd_buf_total == 0 && scd->scd_buf_posting == 0) {
00710                         CDEBUG(D_INFO,
00711                                "Try to recyle %d buffers but nothing left\n",
00712                                scd->scd_buf_adjust);
00713                         scd->scd_buf_adjust = 0;
00714                 }
00715         }
00716 
00717         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00718         LIBCFS_FREE(buf, sizeof(*buf));
00719         spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00720 }
00721 
00722 void
00723 srpc_abort_service(struct srpc_service *sv)
00724 {
00725         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd;
00726         struct srpc_server_rpc  *rpc;
00727         int                     i;
00728 
00729         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Aborting service: id %d, name %s\n",
00730                sv->sv_id, sv->sv_name);
00731 
00732         cfs_percpt_for_each(scd, i, sv->sv_cpt_data) {
00733                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00734 
00735                 /* schedule in-flight RPCs to notice the abort, NB:
00736                  * racing with incoming RPCs; complete fix should make test
00737                  * RPCs carry session ID in its headers */
00738                 list_for_each_entry(rpc, &scd->scd_rpc_active, srpc_list) {
00739                         rpc->srpc_aborted = 1;
00740                         swi_schedule_workitem(&rpc->srpc_wi);
00741                 }
00742 
00743                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00744         }
00745 }
00746 
00747 void
00748 srpc_shutdown_service(srpc_service_t *sv)
00749 {
00750         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd;
00751         struct srpc_server_rpc  *rpc;
00752         srpc_buffer_t           *buf;
00753         int                     i;
00754 
00755         CDEBUG(D_NET, "Shutting down service: id %d, name %s\n",
00756                sv->sv_id, sv->sv_name);
00757 
00758         cfs_percpt_for_each(scd, i, sv->sv_cpt_data)
00759                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00760 
00761         sv->sv_shuttingdown = 1; /* i.e. no new active RPC */
00762 
00763         cfs_percpt_for_each(scd, i, sv->sv_cpt_data)
00764                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00765 
00766         cfs_percpt_for_each(scd, i, sv->sv_cpt_data) {
00767                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00768 
00769                 /* schedule in-flight RPCs to notice the shutdown */
00770                 list_for_each_entry(rpc, &scd->scd_rpc_active, srpc_list)
00771                         swi_schedule_workitem(&rpc->srpc_wi);
00772 
00773                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00774 
00775                 /* OK to traverse scd_buf_posted without lock, since no one
00776                  * touches scd_buf_posted now */
00777                 list_for_each_entry(buf, &scd->scd_buf_posted, buf_list)
00778                         LNetMDUnlink(buf->buf_mdh);
00779         }
00780 }
00781 
00782 static int
00783 srpc_send_request (srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc)
00784 {
00785         srpc_event_t *ev = &rpc->crpc_reqstev;
00786         int           rc;
00787 
00788         ev->ev_fired = 0;
00789         ev->ev_data  = rpc;
00790         ev->ev_type  = SRPC_REQUEST_SENT;
00791 
00792         rc = srpc_post_active_rdma(srpc_serv_portal(rpc->crpc_service),
00793                                    rpc->crpc_service, &rpc->crpc_reqstmsg,
00794                                    sizeof(srpc_msg_t), LNET_MD_OP_PUT,
00795                                    rpc->crpc_dest, LNET_NID_ANY,
00796                                    &rpc->crpc_reqstmdh, ev);
00797         if (rc != 0) {
00798                 LASSERT (rc == -ENOMEM);
00799                 ev->ev_fired = 1;  /* no more event expected */
00800         }
00801         return rc;
00802 }
00803 
00804 static int
00805 srpc_prepare_reply (srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc)
00806 {
00807         srpc_event_t *ev = &rpc->crpc_replyev;
00808         __u64        *id = &rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.reqst.rpyid;
00809         int           rc;
00810 
00811         ev->ev_fired = 0;
00812         ev->ev_data  = rpc;
00813         ev->ev_type  = SRPC_REPLY_RCVD;
00814 
00815         *id = srpc_next_id();
00816 
00817         rc = srpc_post_passive_rdma(SRPC_RDMA_PORTAL, 0, *id,
00818                                     &rpc->crpc_replymsg, sizeof(srpc_msg_t),
00819                                     LNET_MD_OP_PUT, rpc->crpc_dest,
00820                                     &rpc->crpc_replymdh, ev);
00821         if (rc != 0) {
00822                 LASSERT (rc == -ENOMEM);
00823                 ev->ev_fired = 1;  /* no more event expected */
00824         }
00825         return rc;
00826 }
00827 
00828 static int
00829 srpc_prepare_bulk (srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc)
00830 {
00831         srpc_bulk_t  *bk = &rpc->crpc_bulk;
00832         srpc_event_t *ev = &rpc->crpc_bulkev;
00833         __u64        *id = &rpc->crpc_reqstmsg.msg_body.reqst.bulkid;
00834         int           rc;
00835         int           opt;
00836 
00837         LASSERT (bk->bk_niov <= LNET_MAX_IOV);
00838 
00839         if (bk->bk_niov == 0) return 0; /* nothing to do */
00840 
00841         opt = bk->bk_sink ? LNET_MD_OP_PUT : LNET_MD_OP_GET;
00842         opt |= LNET_MD_KIOV;
00843 
00844         ev->ev_fired = 0;
00845         ev->ev_data  = rpc;
00846         ev->ev_type  = SRPC_BULK_REQ_RCVD;
00847 
00848         *id = srpc_next_id();
00849 
00850         rc = srpc_post_passive_rdma(SRPC_RDMA_PORTAL, 0, *id,
00851                                     &bk->bk_iovs[0], bk->bk_niov, opt,
00852                                     rpc->crpc_dest, &bk->bk_mdh, ev);
00853         if (rc != 0) {
00854                 LASSERT (rc == -ENOMEM);
00855                 ev->ev_fired = 1;  /* no more event expected */
00856         }
00857         return rc;
00858 }
00859 
00860 static int
00861 srpc_do_bulk (srpc_server_rpc_t *rpc)
00862 {
00863         srpc_event_t  *ev = &rpc->srpc_ev;
00864         srpc_bulk_t   *bk = rpc->srpc_bulk;
00865         __u64          id = rpc->srpc_reqstbuf->buf_msg.msg_body.reqst.bulkid;
00866         int            rc;
00867         int            opt;
00868 
00869         LASSERT (bk != NULL);
00870 
00871         opt = bk->bk_sink ? LNET_MD_OP_GET : LNET_MD_OP_PUT;
00872         opt |= LNET_MD_KIOV;
00873 
00874         ev->ev_fired = 0;
00875         ev->ev_data  = rpc;
00876         ev->ev_type  = bk->bk_sink ? SRPC_BULK_GET_RPLD : SRPC_BULK_PUT_SENT;
00877 
00878         rc = srpc_post_active_rdma(SRPC_RDMA_PORTAL, id,
00879                                    &bk->bk_iovs[0], bk->bk_niov, opt,
00880                                    rpc->srpc_peer, rpc->srpc_self,
00881                                    &bk->bk_mdh, ev);
00882         if (rc != 0)
00883                 ev->ev_fired = 1;  /* no more event expected */
00884         return rc;
00885 }
00886 
00887 /* only called from srpc_handle_rpc */
00888 static void
00889 srpc_server_rpc_done(srpc_server_rpc_t *rpc, int status)
00890 {
00891         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd = rpc->srpc_scd;
00892         struct srpc_service     *sv  = scd->scd_svc;
00893         srpc_buffer_t           *buffer;
00894 
00895         LASSERT (status != 0 || rpc->srpc_wi.swi_state == SWI_STATE_DONE);
00896 
00897         rpc->srpc_status = status;
00898 
00899         CDEBUG_LIMIT (status == 0 ? D_NET : D_NETERROR,
00900                 "Server RPC %p done: service %s, peer %s, status %s:%d\n",
00901                 rpc, sv->sv_name, libcfs_id2str(rpc->srpc_peer),
00902                 swi_state2str(rpc->srpc_wi.swi_state), status);
00903 
00904         if (status != 0) {
00905                 spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00906                 srpc_data.rpc_counters.rpcs_dropped++;
00907                 spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
00908         }
00909 
00910         if (rpc->srpc_done != NULL)
00911                 (*rpc->srpc_done) (rpc);
00912         LASSERT(rpc->srpc_bulk == NULL);
00913 
00914         spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00915 
00916         if (rpc->srpc_reqstbuf != NULL) {
00917                 /* NB might drop sv_lock in srpc_service_recycle_buffer, but
00918                  * sv won't go away for scd_rpc_active must not be empty */
00919                 srpc_service_recycle_buffer(scd, rpc->srpc_reqstbuf);
00920                 rpc->srpc_reqstbuf = NULL;
00921         }
00922 
00923         list_del(&rpc->srpc_list); /* from scd->scd_rpc_active */
00924 
00925         /*
00926          * No one can schedule me now since:
00927          * - I'm not on scd_rpc_active.
00928          * - all LNet events have been fired.
00929          * Cancel pending schedules and prevent future schedule attempts:
00930          */
00931         LASSERT(rpc->srpc_ev.ev_fired);
00932         swi_exit_workitem(&rpc->srpc_wi);
00933 
00934         if (!sv->sv_shuttingdown && !list_empty(&scd->scd_buf_blocked)) {
00935                 buffer = list_entry(scd->scd_buf_blocked.next,
00936                                         srpc_buffer_t, buf_list);
00937                 list_del(&buffer->buf_list);
00938 
00939                 srpc_init_server_rpc(rpc, scd, buffer);
00940                 list_add_tail(&rpc->srpc_list, &scd->scd_rpc_active);
00941                 swi_schedule_workitem(&rpc->srpc_wi);
00942         } else {
00943                 list_add(&rpc->srpc_list, &scd->scd_rpc_free);
00944         }
00945 
00946         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00947         return;
00948 }
00949 
00950 /* handles an incoming RPC */
00951 int
00952 srpc_handle_rpc(swi_workitem_t *wi)
00953 {
00954         struct srpc_server_rpc  *rpc = wi->swi_workitem.wi_data;
00955         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd = rpc->srpc_scd;
00956         struct srpc_service     *sv = scd->scd_svc;
00957         srpc_event_t            *ev = &rpc->srpc_ev;
00958         int                     rc = 0;
00959 
00960         LASSERT(wi == &rpc->srpc_wi);
00961 
00962         spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
00963 
00964         if (sv->sv_shuttingdown || rpc->srpc_aborted) {
00965                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00966 
00967                 if (rpc->srpc_bulk != NULL)
00968                         LNetMDUnlink(rpc->srpc_bulk->bk_mdh);
00969                 LNetMDUnlink(rpc->srpc_replymdh);
00970 
00971                 if (ev->ev_fired) { /* no more event, OK to finish */
00972                         srpc_server_rpc_done(rpc, -ESHUTDOWN);
00973                         return 1;
00974                 }
00975                 return 0;
00976         }
00977 
00978         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
00979 
00980         switch (wi->swi_state) {
00981         default:
00982                 LBUG ();
00983         case SWI_STATE_NEWBORN: {
00984                 srpc_msg_t           *msg;
00985                 srpc_generic_reply_t *reply;
00986 
00987                 msg = &rpc->srpc_reqstbuf->buf_msg;
00988                 reply = &rpc->srpc_replymsg.msg_body.reply;
00989 
00990                 if (msg->msg_magic == 0) {
00991                         /* moaned already in srpc_lnet_ev_handler */
00992                         srpc_server_rpc_done(rpc, EBADMSG);
00993                         return 1;
00994                 }
00995 
00996                 srpc_unpack_msg_hdr(msg);
00997                 if (msg->msg_version != SRPC_MSG_VERSION) {
00998                         CWARN("Version mismatch: %u, %u expected, from %s\n",
00999                               msg->msg_version, SRPC_MSG_VERSION,
01000                               libcfs_id2str(rpc->srpc_peer));
01001                         reply->status = EPROTO;
01002                         /* drop through and send reply */
01003                 } else {
01004                         reply->status = 0;
01005                         rc = (*sv->sv_handler)(rpc);
01006                         LASSERT(reply->status == 0 || !rpc->srpc_bulk);
01007                         if (rc != 0) {
01008                                 srpc_server_rpc_done(rpc, rc);
01009                                 return 1;
01010                         }
01011                 }
01012 
01013                 wi->swi_state = SWI_STATE_BULK_STARTED;
01014 
01015                 if (rpc->srpc_bulk != NULL) {
01016                         rc = srpc_do_bulk(rpc);
01017                         if (rc == 0)
01018                                 return 0; /* wait for bulk */
01019 
01020                         LASSERT (ev->ev_fired);
01021                         ev->ev_status = rc;
01022                 }
01023         }
01024         case SWI_STATE_BULK_STARTED:
01025                 LASSERT (rpc->srpc_bulk == NULL || ev->ev_fired);
01026 
01027                 if (rpc->srpc_bulk != NULL) {
01028                         rc = ev->ev_status;
01029 
01030                         if (sv->sv_bulk_ready != NULL)
01031                                 rc = (*sv->sv_bulk_ready) (rpc, rc);
01032 
01033                         if (rc != 0) {
01034                                 srpc_server_rpc_done(rpc, rc);
01035                                 return 1;
01036                         }
01037                 }
01038 
01039                 wi->swi_state = SWI_STATE_REPLY_SUBMITTED;
01040                 rc = srpc_send_reply(rpc);
01041                 if (rc == 0)
01042                         return 0; /* wait for reply */
01043                 srpc_server_rpc_done(rpc, rc);
01044                 return 1;
01045 
01046         case SWI_STATE_REPLY_SUBMITTED:
01047                 if (!ev->ev_fired) {
01048                         CERROR("RPC %p: bulk %p, service %d\n",
01049                                rpc, rpc->srpc_bulk, sv->sv_id);
01050                         CERROR("Event: status %d, type %d, lnet %d\n",
01051                                ev->ev_status, ev->ev_type, ev->ev_lnet);
01052                         LASSERT (ev->ev_fired);
01053                 }
01054 
01055                 wi->swi_state = SWI_STATE_DONE;
01056                 srpc_server_rpc_done(rpc, ev->ev_status);
01057                 return 1;
01058         }
01059 
01060         return 0;
01061 }
01062 
01063 static void
01064 srpc_client_rpc_expired (void *data)
01065 {
01066         srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc = data;
01067 
01068         CWARN ("Client RPC expired: service %d, peer %s, timeout %d.\n",
01069                rpc->crpc_service, libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest),
01070                rpc->crpc_timeout);
01071 
01072         spin_lock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01073 
01074         rpc->crpc_timeout = 0;
01075         srpc_abort_rpc(rpc, -ETIMEDOUT);
01076 
01077         spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01078 
01079         spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01080         srpc_data.rpc_counters.rpcs_expired++;
01081         spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01082 }
01083 
01084 static void
01085 srpc_add_client_rpc_timer(srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc)
01086 {
01087         stt_timer_t *timer = &rpc->crpc_timer;
01088 
01089         if (rpc->crpc_timeout == 0)
01090                 return;
01091 
01092         INIT_LIST_HEAD(&timer->stt_list);
01093         timer->stt_data    = rpc;
01094         timer->stt_func    = srpc_client_rpc_expired;
01095         timer->stt_expires = cfs_time_add(rpc->crpc_timeout,
01096                                           cfs_time_current_sec());
01097         stt_add_timer(timer);
01098         return;
01099 }
01100 
01101 /*
01102  * Called with rpc->crpc_lock held.
01103  *
01104  * Upon exit the RPC expiry timer is not queued and the handler is not
01105  * running on any CPU. */
01106 static void
01107 srpc_del_client_rpc_timer (srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc)
01108 {
01109         /* timer not planted or already exploded */
01110         if (rpc->crpc_timeout == 0)
01111                 return;
01112 
01113         /* timer successfully defused */
01114         if (stt_del_timer(&rpc->crpc_timer))
01115                 return;
01116 
01117         /* timer detonated, wait for it to explode */
01118         while (rpc->crpc_timeout != 0) {
01119                 spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01120 
01121                 schedule();
01122 
01123                 spin_lock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01124         }
01125 }
01126 
01127 static void
01128 srpc_client_rpc_done (srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc, int status)
01129 {
01130         swi_workitem_t *wi = &rpc->crpc_wi;
01131 
01132         LASSERT(status != 0 || wi->swi_state == SWI_STATE_DONE);
01133 
01134         spin_lock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01135 
01136         rpc->crpc_closed = 1;
01137         if (rpc->crpc_status == 0)
01138                 rpc->crpc_status = status;
01139 
01140         srpc_del_client_rpc_timer(rpc);
01141 
01142         CDEBUG_LIMIT ((status == 0) ? D_NET : D_NETERROR,
01143                 "Client RPC done: service %d, peer %s, status %s:%d:%d\n",
01144                 rpc->crpc_service, libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest),
01145                 swi_state2str(wi->swi_state), rpc->crpc_aborted, status);
01146 
01147         /*
01148          * No one can schedule me now since:
01149          * - RPC timer has been defused.
01150          * - all LNet events have been fired.
01151          * - crpc_closed has been set, preventing srpc_abort_rpc from
01152          *   scheduling me.
01153          * Cancel pending schedules and prevent future schedule attempts:
01154          */
01155         LASSERT (!srpc_event_pending(rpc));
01156         swi_exit_workitem(wi);
01157 
01158         spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01159 
01160         (*rpc->crpc_done)(rpc);
01161         return;
01162 }
01163 
01164 /* sends an outgoing RPC */
01165 int
01166 srpc_send_rpc (swi_workitem_t *wi)
01167 {
01168         int                rc = 0;
01169         srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc;
01170         srpc_msg_t        *reply;
01171         int                do_bulk;
01172 
01173         LASSERT(wi != NULL);
01174 
01175         rpc = wi->swi_workitem.wi_data;
01176 
01177         LASSERT (rpc != NULL);
01178         LASSERT (wi == &rpc->crpc_wi);
01179 
01180         reply = &rpc->crpc_replymsg;
01181         do_bulk = rpc->crpc_bulk.bk_niov > 0;
01182 
01183         spin_lock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01184 
01185         if (rpc->crpc_aborted) {
01186                 spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01187                 goto abort;
01188         }
01189 
01190         spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01191 
01192         switch (wi->swi_state) {
01193         default:
01194                 LBUG ();
01195         case SWI_STATE_NEWBORN:
01196                 LASSERT (!srpc_event_pending(rpc));
01197 
01198                 rc = srpc_prepare_reply(rpc);
01199                 if (rc != 0) {
01200                         srpc_client_rpc_done(rpc, rc);
01201                         return 1;
01202                 }
01203 
01204                 rc = srpc_prepare_bulk(rpc);
01205                 if (rc != 0) break;
01206 
01207                 wi->swi_state = SWI_STATE_REQUEST_SUBMITTED;
01208                 rc = srpc_send_request(rpc);
01209                 break;
01210 
01211         case SWI_STATE_REQUEST_SUBMITTED:
01212                 /* CAVEAT EMPTOR: rqtev, rpyev, and bulkev may come in any
01213                  * order; however, they're processed in a strict order:
01214                  * rqt, rpy, and bulk. */
01215                 if (!rpc->crpc_reqstev.ev_fired) break;
01216 
01217                 rc = rpc->crpc_reqstev.ev_status;
01218                 if (rc != 0) break;
01219 
01220                 wi->swi_state = SWI_STATE_REQUEST_SENT;
01221                 /* perhaps more events, fall thru */
01222         case SWI_STATE_REQUEST_SENT: {
01223                 srpc_msg_type_t type = srpc_service2reply(rpc->crpc_service);
01224 
01225                 if (!rpc->crpc_replyev.ev_fired) break;
01226 
01227                 rc = rpc->crpc_replyev.ev_status;
01228                 if (rc != 0) break;
01229 
01230                 srpc_unpack_msg_hdr(reply);
01231                 if (reply->msg_type != type ||
01232                     (reply->msg_magic != SRPC_MSG_MAGIC &&
01233                      reply->msg_magic != __swab32(SRPC_MSG_MAGIC))) {
01234                         CWARN ("Bad message from %s: type %u (%d expected),"
01235                                " magic %u (%d expected).\n",
01236                                libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest),
01237                                reply->msg_type, type,
01238                                reply->msg_magic, SRPC_MSG_MAGIC);
01239                         rc = -EBADMSG;
01240                         break;
01241                 }
01242 
01243                 if (do_bulk && reply->msg_body.reply.status != 0) {
01244                         CWARN ("Remote error %d at %s, unlink bulk buffer in "
01245                                "case peer didn't initiate bulk transfer\n",
01246                                reply->msg_body.reply.status,
01247                                libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest));
01248                         LNetMDUnlink(rpc->crpc_bulk.bk_mdh);
01249                 }
01250 
01251                 wi->swi_state = SWI_STATE_REPLY_RECEIVED;
01252         }
01253         case SWI_STATE_REPLY_RECEIVED:
01254                 if (do_bulk && !rpc->crpc_bulkev.ev_fired) break;
01255 
01256                 rc = do_bulk ? rpc->crpc_bulkev.ev_status : 0;
01257 
01258                 /* Bulk buffer was unlinked due to remote error. Clear error
01259                  * since reply buffer still contains valid data.
01260                  * NB rpc->crpc_done shouldn't look into bulk data in case of
01261                  * remote error. */
01262                 if (do_bulk && rpc->crpc_bulkev.ev_lnet == LNET_EVENT_UNLINK &&
01263                     rpc->crpc_status == 0 && reply->msg_body.reply.status != 0)
01264                         rc = 0;
01265 
01266                 wi->swi_state = SWI_STATE_DONE;
01267                 srpc_client_rpc_done(rpc, rc);
01268                 return 1;
01269         }
01270 
01271         if (rc != 0) {
01272                 spin_lock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01273                 srpc_abort_rpc(rpc, rc);
01274                 spin_unlock(&rpc->crpc_lock);
01275         }
01276 
01277 abort:
01278         if (rpc->crpc_aborted) {
01279                 LNetMDUnlink(rpc->crpc_reqstmdh);
01280                 LNetMDUnlink(rpc->crpc_replymdh);
01281                 LNetMDUnlink(rpc->crpc_bulk.bk_mdh);
01282 
01283                 if (!srpc_event_pending(rpc)) {
01284                         srpc_client_rpc_done(rpc, -EINTR);
01285                         return 1;
01286                 }
01287         }
01288         return 0;
01289 }
01290 
01291 srpc_client_rpc_t *
01292 srpc_create_client_rpc (lnet_process_id_t peer, int service,
01293                         int nbulkiov, int bulklen,
01294                         void (*rpc_done)(srpc_client_rpc_t *),
01295                         void (*rpc_fini)(srpc_client_rpc_t *), void *priv)
01296 {
01297         srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc;
01298 
01299         LIBCFS_ALLOC(rpc, offsetof(srpc_client_rpc_t,
01300                                    crpc_bulk.bk_iovs[nbulkiov]));
01301         if (rpc == NULL)
01302                 return NULL;
01303 
01304         srpc_init_client_rpc(rpc, peer, service, nbulkiov,
01305                              bulklen, rpc_done, rpc_fini, priv);
01306         return rpc;
01307 }
01308 
01309 /* called with rpc->crpc_lock held */
01310 void
01311 srpc_abort_rpc (srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc, int why)
01312 {
01313         LASSERT (why != 0);
01314 
01315         if (rpc->crpc_aborted || /* already aborted */
01316             rpc->crpc_closed)    /* callback imminent */
01317                 return;
01318 
01319         CDEBUG (D_NET,
01320                 "Aborting RPC: service %d, peer %s, state %s, why %d\n",
01321                 rpc->crpc_service, libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest),
01322                 swi_state2str(rpc->crpc_wi.swi_state), why);
01323 
01324         rpc->crpc_aborted = 1;
01325         rpc->crpc_status  = why;
01326         swi_schedule_workitem(&rpc->crpc_wi);
01327         return;
01328 }
01329 
01330 /* called with rpc->crpc_lock held */
01331 void
01332 srpc_post_rpc (srpc_client_rpc_t *rpc)
01333 {
01334         LASSERT (!rpc->crpc_aborted);
01335         LASSERT (srpc_data.rpc_state == SRPC_STATE_RUNNING);
01336 
01337         CDEBUG (D_NET, "Posting RPC: peer %s, service %d, timeout %d\n",
01338                 libcfs_id2str(rpc->crpc_dest), rpc->crpc_service,
01339                 rpc->crpc_timeout);
01340 
01341         srpc_add_client_rpc_timer(rpc);
01342         swi_schedule_workitem(&rpc->crpc_wi);
01343         return;
01344 }
01345 
01346 
01347 int
01348 srpc_send_reply(struct srpc_server_rpc *rpc)
01349 {
01350         srpc_event_t            *ev = &rpc->srpc_ev;
01351         struct srpc_msg         *msg = &rpc->srpc_replymsg;
01352         struct srpc_buffer      *buffer = rpc->srpc_reqstbuf;
01353         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd = rpc->srpc_scd;
01354         struct srpc_service     *sv = scd->scd_svc;
01355         __u64                   rpyid;
01356         int                     rc;
01357 
01358         LASSERT(buffer != NULL);
01359         rpyid = buffer->buf_msg.msg_body.reqst.rpyid;
01360 
01361         spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
01362 
01363         if (!sv->sv_shuttingdown && !srpc_serv_is_framework(sv)) {
01364                 /* Repost buffer before replying since test client
01365                  * might send me another RPC once it gets the reply */
01366                 if (srpc_service_post_buffer(scd, buffer) != 0)
01367                         CWARN("Failed to repost %s buffer\n", sv->sv_name);
01368                 rpc->srpc_reqstbuf = NULL;
01369         }
01370 
01371         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
01372 
01373         ev->ev_fired = 0;
01374         ev->ev_data  = rpc;
01375         ev->ev_type  = SRPC_REPLY_SENT;
01376 
01377         msg->msg_magic   = SRPC_MSG_MAGIC;
01378         msg->msg_version = SRPC_MSG_VERSION;
01379         msg->msg_type    = srpc_service2reply(sv->sv_id);
01380 
01381         rc = srpc_post_active_rdma(SRPC_RDMA_PORTAL, rpyid, msg,
01382                                    sizeof(*msg), LNET_MD_OP_PUT,
01383                                    rpc->srpc_peer, rpc->srpc_self,
01384                                    &rpc->srpc_replymdh, ev);
01385         if (rc != 0)
01386                 ev->ev_fired = 1;  /* no more event expected */
01387         return rc;
01388 }
01389 
01390 /* when in kernel always called with LNET_LOCK() held, and in thread context */
01391 static void
01392 srpc_lnet_ev_handler(lnet_event_t *ev)
01393 {
01394         struct srpc_service_cd  *scd;
01395         srpc_event_t      *rpcev = ev->md.user_ptr;
01396         srpc_client_rpc_t *crpc;
01397         srpc_server_rpc_t *srpc;
01398         srpc_buffer_t     *buffer;
01399         srpc_service_t    *sv;
01400         srpc_msg_t        *msg;
01401         srpc_msg_type_t    type;
01402 
01403         LASSERT (!in_interrupt());
01404 
01405         if (ev->status != 0) {
01406                 __u32 errors;
01407 
01408                 spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01409                 if (ev->status != -ECANCELED) /* cancellation is not error */
01410                         srpc_data.rpc_counters.errors++;
01411                 errors = srpc_data.rpc_counters.errors;
01412                 spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01413 
01414                 CNETERR("LNet event status %d type %d, RPC errors %u\n",
01415                         ev->status, ev->type, errors);
01416         }
01417 
01418         rpcev->ev_lnet = ev->type;
01419 
01420         switch (rpcev->ev_type) {
01421         default:
01422                 CERROR("Unknown event: status %d, type %d, lnet %d\n",
01423                        rpcev->ev_status, rpcev->ev_type, rpcev->ev_lnet);
01424                 LBUG ();
01425         case SRPC_REQUEST_SENT:
01426                 if (ev->status == 0 && ev->type != LNET_EVENT_UNLINK) {
01427                         spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01428                         srpc_data.rpc_counters.rpcs_sent++;
01429                         spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01430                 }
01431         case SRPC_REPLY_RCVD:
01432         case SRPC_BULK_REQ_RCVD:
01433                 crpc = rpcev->ev_data;
01434 
01435                 if (rpcev != &crpc->crpc_reqstev &&
01436                     rpcev != &crpc->crpc_replyev &&
01437                     rpcev != &crpc->crpc_bulkev) {
01438                         CERROR("rpcev %p, crpc %p, reqstev %p, replyev %p, bulkev %p\n",
01439                                rpcev, crpc, &crpc->crpc_reqstev,
01440                                &crpc->crpc_replyev, &crpc->crpc_bulkev);
01441                         CERROR("Bad event: status %d, type %d, lnet %d\n",
01442                                rpcev->ev_status, rpcev->ev_type, rpcev->ev_lnet);
01443                         LBUG ();
01444                 }
01445 
01446                 spin_lock(&crpc->crpc_lock);
01447 
01448                 LASSERT(rpcev->ev_fired == 0);
01449                 rpcev->ev_fired  = 1;
01450                 rpcev->ev_status = (ev->type == LNET_EVENT_UNLINK) ?
01451                                                 -EINTR : ev->status;
01452                 swi_schedule_workitem(&crpc->crpc_wi);
01453 
01454                 spin_unlock(&crpc->crpc_lock);
01455                 break;
01456 
01457         case SRPC_REQUEST_RCVD:
01458                 scd = rpcev->ev_data;
01459                 sv = scd->scd_svc;
01460 
01461                 LASSERT(rpcev == &scd->scd_ev);
01462 
01463                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
01464 
01465                 LASSERT (ev->unlinked);
01466                 LASSERT (ev->type == LNET_EVENT_PUT ||
01467                          ev->type == LNET_EVENT_UNLINK);
01468                 LASSERT (ev->type != LNET_EVENT_UNLINK ||
01469                          sv->sv_shuttingdown);
01470 
01471                 buffer = container_of(ev->md.start, srpc_buffer_t, buf_msg);
01472                 buffer->buf_peer = ev->initiator;
01473                 buffer->buf_self = ev->target.nid;
01474 
01475                 LASSERT(scd->scd_buf_nposted > 0);
01476                 scd->scd_buf_nposted--;
01477 
01478                 if (sv->sv_shuttingdown) {
01479                         /* Leave buffer on scd->scd_buf_nposted since
01480                          * srpc_finish_service needs to traverse it. */
01481                         spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
01482                         break;
01483                 }
01484 
01485                 if (scd->scd_buf_err_stamp != 0 &&
01486                     scd->scd_buf_err_stamp < cfs_time_current_sec()) {
01487                         /* re-enable adding buffer */
01488                         scd->scd_buf_err_stamp = 0;
01489                         scd->scd_buf_err = 0;
01490                 }
01491 
01492                 if (scd->scd_buf_err == 0 && /* adding buffer is enabled */
01493                     scd->scd_buf_adjust == 0 &&
01494                     scd->scd_buf_nposted < scd->scd_buf_low) {
01495                         scd->scd_buf_adjust = MAX(scd->scd_buf_total / 2,
01496                                                   SFW_TEST_WI_MIN);
01497                         swi_schedule_workitem(&scd->scd_buf_wi);
01498                 }
01499 
01500                 list_del(&buffer->buf_list); /* from scd->scd_buf_posted */
01501                 msg = &buffer->buf_msg;
01502                 type = srpc_service2request(sv->sv_id);
01503 
01504                 if (ev->status != 0 || ev->mlength != sizeof(*msg) ||
01505                     (msg->msg_type != type &&
01506                      msg->msg_type != __swab32(type)) ||
01507                     (msg->msg_magic != SRPC_MSG_MAGIC &&
01508                      msg->msg_magic != __swab32(SRPC_MSG_MAGIC))) {
01509                         CERROR ("Dropping RPC (%s) from %s: "
01510                                 "status %d mlength %d type %u magic %u.\n",
01511                                 sv->sv_name, libcfs_id2str(ev->initiator),
01512                                 ev->status, ev->mlength,
01513                                 msg->msg_type, msg->msg_magic);
01514 
01515                         /* NB can't call srpc_service_recycle_buffer here since
01516                          * it may call LNetM[DE]Attach. The invalid magic tells
01517                          * srpc_handle_rpc to drop this RPC */
01518                         msg->msg_magic = 0;
01519                 }
01520 
01521                 if (!list_empty(&scd->scd_rpc_free)) {
01522                         srpc = list_entry(scd->scd_rpc_free.next,
01523                                           struct srpc_server_rpc,
01524                                           srpc_list);
01525                         list_del(&srpc->srpc_list);
01526 
01527                         srpc_init_server_rpc(srpc, scd, buffer);
01528                         list_add_tail(&srpc->srpc_list,
01529                                       &scd->scd_rpc_active);
01530                         swi_schedule_workitem(&srpc->srpc_wi);
01531                 } else {
01532                         list_add_tail(&buffer->buf_list,
01533                                       &scd->scd_buf_blocked);
01534                 }
01535 
01536                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
01537 
01538                 spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01539                 srpc_data.rpc_counters.rpcs_rcvd++;
01540                 spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01541                 break;
01542 
01543         case SRPC_BULK_GET_RPLD:
01544                 LASSERT (ev->type == LNET_EVENT_SEND ||
01545                          ev->type == LNET_EVENT_REPLY ||
01546                          ev->type == LNET_EVENT_UNLINK);
01547 
01548                 if (!ev->unlinked)
01549                         break; /* wait for final event */
01550 
01551         case SRPC_BULK_PUT_SENT:
01552                 if (ev->status == 0 && ev->type != LNET_EVENT_UNLINK) {
01553                         spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01554 
01555                         if (rpcev->ev_type == SRPC_BULK_GET_RPLD)
01556                                 srpc_data.rpc_counters.bulk_get += ev->mlength;
01557                         else
01558                                 srpc_data.rpc_counters.bulk_put += ev->mlength;
01559 
01560                         spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01561                 }
01562         case SRPC_REPLY_SENT:
01563                 srpc = rpcev->ev_data;
01564                 scd  = srpc->srpc_scd;
01565 
01566                 LASSERT(rpcev == &srpc->srpc_ev);
01567 
01568                 spin_lock(&scd->scd_lock);
01569 
01570                 rpcev->ev_fired  = 1;
01571                 rpcev->ev_status = (ev->type == LNET_EVENT_UNLINK) ?
01572                                    -EINTR : ev->status;
01573                 swi_schedule_workitem(&srpc->srpc_wi);
01574 
01575                 spin_unlock(&scd->scd_lock);
01576                 break;
01577         }
01578 }
01579 
01580 
01581 int
01582 srpc_startup (void)
01583 {
01584         int rc;
01585 
01586         memset(&srpc_data, 0, sizeof(struct smoketest_rpc));
01587         spin_lock_init(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01588 
01589         /* 1 second pause to avoid timestamp reuse */
01590         set_current_state(TASK_UNINTERRUPTIBLE);
01591         schedule_timeout(cfs_time_seconds(1));
01592         srpc_data.rpc_matchbits = ((__u64) cfs_time_current_sec()) << 48;
01593 
01594         srpc_data.rpc_state = SRPC_STATE_NONE;
01595 
01596         rc = LNetNIInit(LNET_PID_LUSTRE);
01597         if (rc < 0) {
01598                 CERROR ("LNetNIInit() has failed: %d\n", rc);
01599                 return rc;
01600         }
01601 
01602         srpc_data.rpc_state = SRPC_STATE_NI_INIT;
01603 
01604         LNetInvalidateHandle(&srpc_data.rpc_lnet_eq);
01605         rc = LNetEQAlloc(0, srpc_lnet_ev_handler, &srpc_data.rpc_lnet_eq);
01606         if (rc != 0) {
01607                 CERROR("LNetEQAlloc() has failed: %d\n", rc);
01608                 goto bail;
01609         }
01610 
01611         rc = LNetSetLazyPortal(SRPC_FRAMEWORK_REQUEST_PORTAL);
01612         LASSERT(rc == 0);
01613         rc = LNetSetLazyPortal(SRPC_REQUEST_PORTAL);
01614         LASSERT(rc == 0);
01615 
01616         srpc_data.rpc_state = SRPC_STATE_EQ_INIT;
01617 
01618         rc = stt_startup();
01619 
01620 bail:
01621         if (rc != 0)
01622                 srpc_shutdown();
01623         else
01624                 srpc_data.rpc_state = SRPC_STATE_RUNNING;
01625 
01626         return rc;
01627 }
01628 
01629 void
01630 srpc_shutdown (void)
01631 {
01632         int i;
01633         int rc;
01634         int state;
01635 
01636         state = srpc_data.rpc_state;
01637         srpc_data.rpc_state = SRPC_STATE_STOPPING;
01638 
01639         switch (state) {
01640         default:
01641                 LBUG ();
01642         case SRPC_STATE_RUNNING:
01643                 spin_lock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01644 
01645                 for (i = 0; i <= SRPC_SERVICE_MAX_ID; i++) {
01646                         srpc_service_t *sv = srpc_data.rpc_services[i];
01647 
01648                         LASSERTF (sv == NULL,
01649                                   "service not empty: id %d, name %s\n",
01650                                   i, sv->sv_name);
01651                 }
01652 
01653                 spin_unlock(&srpc_data.rpc_glock);
01654 
01655                 stt_shutdown();
01656 
01657         case SRPC_STATE_EQ_INIT:
01658                 rc = LNetClearLazyPortal(SRPC_FRAMEWORK_REQUEST_PORTAL);
01659                 rc = LNetClearLazyPortal(SRPC_REQUEST_PORTAL);
01660                 LASSERT (rc == 0);
01661                 rc = LNetEQFree(srpc_data.rpc_lnet_eq);
01662                 LASSERT (rc == 0); /* the EQ should have no user by now */
01663 
01664         case SRPC_STATE_NI_INIT:
01665                 LNetNIFini();
01666         }
01667 
01668         return;
01669 }
